overview: Feel the power of your favorite Marvel Super Heroes in Madame Tussauds Las Vegas' new thrilling 4D movie! Experience wind-chilling water-soaking and face-flinching special effects as you get closer than ever before to Captain Marvel, Thor, Black Panther, Rocket, Spider-Man, Ant-Man and the wasp as they battle Loki a bid to save the world.
title: Marvel Universe 4D
